spell_action.desc: A spell that summons sharp daggers to fly at the enemy.
Several orbs of fire fly towards the enemy and lights them on fire.
These pieces of paper are imbued with spiritual energy.
Leaves of crystal glass slice through the opponent.
Marisa's trademark magical spell of pure destruction.
One of Sakuya's signature attacks that sends a stream of daggers towards a target.
A powerful spell that obliterates Youkai and slows their movements.
Short range, but powerful sword attack.
Blessing of the Heavenly Fox, grants health recovery and an increase in evasion.
Fast moving spell. Dazzling speed may stun an enemy.
Invokes the power of the sacred mirror to fully restore a unit's health.
Gathers the flames of the Phoenix and unleashes it on the enemy.
Alice throws an explosive doll at the enemy, inflicting stun and dizziness.
A powerful gust rips through the enemy, sending them into a dizzying spin.
A barrage of bullets that can hit enemies far away.
A secret treasure embodying the endless power of lunar magic.
A sealing spell derived from lunar magic that imprisons the target in a cage.
Yukari summons Ran and Chen to do a combined attack.
A spell card which summons the souls of the dead in the form of butterflies.
Butterflies dance and release pollen, causing dizziness to those who are allergic.
While delicious roasted, chestnuts raining down on you are pretty dangerous. A short range, but powerful attack.
This regenerative magic is the specialty of the Kodama Lord Haruna and gives a defensive bonus to the holder.
Ayaka's spear is said to be made from the wood of a Jubokko demon tree, granting her spells a poisonous effect.
Ayaka's last spell, embodying the vengeful act of a cornered Kodama Lord.
Does a small amount of damage and a 60% chance of inflicting poison.
Does a small amount of damage and a 80% chance of inflicting stun, causing a unit to stay still for a turn.
A prototype pyrotechnic rocket developed by Nitori. It has a long range with a chance of making the target dizzy.
Does a small amount of damage and a 80% chance of inflicting dizzy, drastically lowering accuracy.
Decreases target's offensive abilities by weakening their resolve.
Decreases target's defensive abilities by cutting through barriers.
Does a small amount of damage and a 80% chance of inflicting spirit drain, causing the target's SC to gradually decrease.
Does a small amount of damage and a 80% chance of causing target's movement range to be halved.
Heals light wounds.
Heals more serious wounds.
Temporarily increases MDEF for 3 turns.
Temporarily increases DEF for 3 turns.
Gives 15% HP regeneration for 4 turns.

Gives 20% to evasion.
Gives 20% to hit chance.
Grantes the target an extra 50SC each turn. Magic conjured by the Kappa and Tengu.
Ran's favorite dish. Recovers 40% of target's Max HP

A medicinal potion that cures Physical Status effects.
A spell tag that erases Magical Status effects. Can only be equipped by Spiritual Magic users.
Sacred flames from beneath Youkai Mountain.
The curse of a weakened Kodama Lord. Slows down the target and may cause them to lose spiritual energy.
Unleashes a swarm of fuzzballs to overwhelm the enemy.
A long range beam attack that reflects power from far away magic sources.
A long range attack that draws upon Fuyuhana's cloud gathering ability. Draws from local spirit sources to cast.

The final curse of a Kodama which ensures that all flowers which bloom turn to ash.
